tool_description: Get product information from various global marketplaces.
name: Global Marketplaces
title: Global Marketplaces

api_list.name: Get Product By ID
api_list.description: Get a specific product by its id.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description:
Without the fields query parameter, the following product fields are returned:
title, price, description, image, link

api_list.name: Search products
api_list.description: Get products from one or more marketplaces

required_parameters.name: marketplace
required_parameters.description: It is possible to query multiple marketplaces

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description:
Without the fields query parameter, the following product fields are returned:
title, id, price, image, link
